Project Status

Current Phase

Pre-alpha active development. The core game loop is playable online, and rules/protocol are documented, but reliability and UX are still being improved.

What Works Today

  • Two-player deployment, combat, reinforcement, and victory flow.
  • Playable real-time browser match flow.
  • Deterministic rules engine and documented protocol contracts.

Known Limitation

Reconnect behavior is not fully complete yet. Rejoin attempts can still fail for already-full matches in current runtime behavior.

Track current engineering status in TASKS.md.

What to Expect

  • Feature and UX changes as playtesting feedback arrives.
  • Occasional downtime or restarts during active development windows.
  • Roadmap ordering can shift as reliability and gameplay findings evolve.
